Sarge: Deemos is here to kill all of those who escaped him when he tried to=
 replace them with drones. I was believed to be killed but I survived. I re=
alized that the guy I used to have command over wouldn't rest till he kille=
d everyone who escaped him and I decided to follow him. I finally found him=
. I'm going to kill him. He has already killed all who escaped him previous=
ly who haven't already died some other way of different reasons. Now he's o=
nly here because he must have someone else he wants to kill.

Sarge looked =
into Nightlight's eyes.

Sarge: Who is it Deemos wants to kill?...

ups.com
